about_the_game:
In this DLC, Kit Marlowe, Amber, and Quince take the cast on a field trip to meet another acting troop. Adds an extra option to each characters choice menu in Act 3 Scene 1. This can alter the way the play goes.

All Act 3 Scene 1 points will be boosted by an extra level.

To play:
a) Install the DLC
b) Reach the end of Act 2
detailed_description:
In this DLC, Kit Marlowe, Amber, and Quince take the cast on a field trip to meet another acting troop. Adds an extra option to each characters choice menu in Act 3 Scene 1. This can alter the way the play goes.

All Act 3 Scene 1 points will be boosted by an extra level.

To play:
a) Install the DLC
b) Reach the end of Act 2
